DataCollected.Purpose: To authenticate users and provide access to app features.
DataCollected.Storage: Data is securely stored in Firebase Authentication services.
DataCollected.SecurityMeasures: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
DataCollected.Compliance: Complies with relevant privacy laws and regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).

DataCollected.Purpose: To personalize user experiences within the app.
DataCollected.SecurityMeasures: Access controls and encryption protocols are in place to protect user data.

DataUsage.Analytics: Anonymous usage analytics may be collected to improve the performance and reliability of the SDK.
DataUsage.Personalization: Data may be used to personalize user experiences within the app.
DataUsage.Advertising: No advertising-related data collection or tracking is performed by the FirebaseAuth SDK.

SecurityMeasures.Encryption: Data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
SecurityMeasures.AccessControls: Strict access controls are enforced to ensure that only authorized personnel can access user data.
SecurityMeasures.RegularSecurityAudits: Regular security audits are conducted to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.

Compliance.GDPR: Compliant with GDPR requirements for handling user data.
Compliance.CCPA: Compliant with CCPA regulations regarding user privacy.
